nodes.text: Piik was an individual who served as a Colonel in the Imperial Military and was stationed in Lessu on the planet Ryloth. During a relief mission to deliver gattis-root to Twi'lek elders, the crew of the Eclipse landed on the outer surface of Lessu, prompting Moff Delian Mors to order ground troops to cut off the crew. Moments after giving the order, Mors saw lights flare on screens as Piik's men turned out from their barracks.
